channel.title: Slider on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Slider on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Switching to Scrivener for WordPress blogging
item.description: I’ve just made the switch - or as we speak, I’m starting to learn about this ‘new’ tool for writers called Scrivener.

item.title: [Video] The Evolution of Mobile
item.description: Amazing cutting edge 3D Graphics along with the history of mobile - If you’ve not seen this - then it is one you can’t miss.

item.title: SEO best practice for using <strong> and <em>
item.description: As more people become aware of HTML5 it’s time to review how tagging written content will impact search engine optimisation.

item.title: Apple Mac App Store initially I was dubious
item.description: Initially I was dubious or even skeptical about the new Apple Mac App Store - and everyone from Mashable to ReadWriteWeb to Download Squad have already done a post about first thoughts or white washed the Apple PR news item.

item.title: 5,000,000 users on Foursquare now focus on activity & retention
item.description: Foursquare this week should break through the 5 million users mark and it has taken about 8 weeks to add an extra million.

item.title: Have you tried LinkedIn lately?
item.description: LinkedIn has been the business social network of choice for many and its nearly 10 years old, but younger upstarts have such a mass that its time to look at what LinkedIn can offer to social media marketing, especially for b2b marketing.

item.title: How to choose a good social media marketing consultant
item.description: Social media marketing is no longer a buzzword and many brands and businesses are choosing to recruit full-time staff to develop and deliver the quicksilver successes of the best viral campaigns.

item.title: 5 steps to create an effective marketing strategy in a downturn
item.description: Creating an effective marketing strategy during a recession is tough. When you’re faced with budget cuts to your marketing spend or trying to figure out what you can do with no budget then you need something better than a good plan, you’re needing a marketing strategy that leads to success.
